price: Mmeranteε asomfoͻ a wͻ’yε wͻn dea, wͻ’te sε nhwene pa a yεde asie, betwa wͻn ho ahyia (asom wͻn).
arabic: ۞ وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ غِلۡمَانٞ لَّهُمۡ كَأَنَّهُمۡ لُؤۡلُؤٞ مَّكۡنُونٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wayaṭūfu ʿalayhim ghil'mānun lahum ka-annahum lu'lu-on maknūnun
